title: Lux: Why are you dressed like an old lady Warwick?
body:
{{champion:19}} The summoner made me...
{{champion:99}} But why do you own it in the first place?
{{champion:122}} I bet it's some sort of fetish.
{{champion:19}} No it was... Annie! I did a part in her school play.
{{champion:99}} Aww, how sweet.
{{champion:19}} I am not sweet!
{{champion:1}} Warwick that play was a month ago. Why do you still have that?
{{champion:122}} Heh.
